documentation.text:
Create a simple auction with `_biddingTime`
 seconds bidding time on behalf of the
 beneficiary address `_beneficiary`.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "There already is a higher bid."

arguments.value: There already is a higher bid.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "There already is a higher bid."

documentation.text:
Bid on the auction with the value sent
 together with this transaction.
 The value will only be refunded if the
 auction is not won.
Withdraw a bid that was overbid.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You are not the auction deployer!"

arguments.value: You are not the auction deployer!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "You are not the auction deployer!"

documentation.text:
End the auction and send the highest bid
 to the beneficiary.

auctionEnd().notice: End the auction and send the highest bid to the beneficiary.

bid(address).notice: Bid on the auction with the value sent together with this transaction. The value will only be refunded if the auction is not won.
